Hey I liked the Pretenders. I have the 1st twelve, Jazz, Grimlock, 
Bumblebee, the two decepticon animals, Bludgeon and ThunderWing. 
TWings my fav. and the headmasters all had places for thier heads 
inside. The weapons are what always got mixxed up and lost on mine.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Yeah, we can only hope that G1 makes it back okay. We need a 
Soundwave even
> better than before! We need a line without those stupid Pretenders 
as well!
> And we need to be able to store the Heads of the Headmasters 
without losing
> them or getting them stuck!...
